page.shortlink: api objects response object append cookie method
page.description: Adds a cookie to the response's cookie collection.

argument.name: Cookie
argument.description: The cookie to add. Commonly used properties are listed below. For a full list of properties and methods, visit the [System::Web::HttpCookie] documentation.

property.name: HttpOnly
property.description: Specifies whether or not the cookie is available client-side.

property.name: SameSite
property.description: The value of the SameSite attribute for the cookie. Can be *[xb:System::Web::SameSiteMode::Lax]*, *[xb:System::Web::SameSiteMode::None]*, or *[xb:System::Web::SameSiteMode::Strict]*.

discussion.p: *[xb:Context.Response.AppendCookie(Cookie)]* adds a cookie to the response's cookie collection.

p.example: dim cookieName as c = "MyCookieName" dim newCookie as System::Web::HttpCookie = new System::Web::HttpCookie(cookieName) newCookie.HttpOnly = .t. newCookie.Value = "This is the cookie's value." Context.Response.AppendCookie(newCookie)

section.title: Example: Setting the SameSite attribute
section.example: dim cookie as System::Web::HttpCookie = new System::Web::HttpCookie("MyCookie", "MyCookieValue") cookie.HttpOnly = .t. cookie.SameSite = System::Web::SameSiteMode::None Context.Response.AppendCookie(cookie)
